SEARCH
Package com.example.tamagotchibackend.Controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.example.tamagotchibackend.Controller.UserController
@RestController @CrossOrigin("http://localhost:4200") public class UserController extends Object
A Controller class for communicating with the Frontend and handling requests. The Service is @Autowired via Dependency Injection from the Spring container.

    • login

      @PostMapping("/auth") public User login(@RequestBody UserDTO userDTO)
      Receives a POST REQUEST containing login data (username, password) for login validation.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - login data (username, password)
      Returns:
      the user, if validated | null, otherwise

    • register

      @PostMapping("/register") public User register(@RequestBody UserDTO userDTO)
      Receives a POST REQUEST containing user data (username, password) for user registration.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - user data (username, password)
      Returns:
      the saved user

    • createTamagotchi

      @PostMapping("/create-tamagotchi/{id}") public User createTamagotchi(@PathVariable Integer id, @RequestBody TamagotchiDTO tamagotchiDTO)
      Receives a POST REQUEST containing tamagotchi data (name, species) for tamagotchi creation.
      Parameters:
      id - integer representing id of user creating the tamagotchi
      tamagotchiDTO - tamagotchi data (name, species)
      Returns:
      the complete user

    • getStatus

      @GetMapping("/home/{id}") public StatusDTO getStatus(@PathVariable Integer id)
      Receives a GET REQUEST and an ID parameter contained in the URL for acquiring the current status of a user's tamagotchi.
      Parameters:
      id - integer representing id of user requesting their tamagotchi's status
      Returns:
      the tamagotchi's status

    • updateStatus

      @PostMapping("/update-status/{id}") public StatusDTO updateStatus(@PathVariable Integer id, @RequestBody StatusDTO statusDTO)
      Receives a POST REQUEST containing status data and an ID parameter in the URL for updating the status of a user's tamagotchi.
      Parameters:
      id - integer representing id of user whose tamagotchi status is updated
      statusDTO - status data (hunger, happiness, cleanliness, age)
      Returns:
      the tamagotchi's updated status

    • killTamagotchi

      @GetMapping("/kill-tamagotchi/{id}") public String killTamagotchi(@PathVariable Integer id)
      Receives a GET REQUEST and an ID parameter contained in the URL for killing a user's tamagotchi.
      Parameters:
      id - integer representing id of user whose tamagotchi has died
      Returns:
      "OK" string
